name: teemii
description: Teemii is a self-hosted team and project management board with tasks, statuses, and collaboration features. It provides a simple, responsive web UI for managing workloads and progress across teams.
features: Project boards: Organize work into projects with customizable boards for different teams or initiatives.
Task management: Create and assign tasks with descriptions, due dates, and priority levels for clear accountability.
Status tracking: Track task progress through customizable status columns like todo, in progress, and done.
Team collaboration: Work together with team members on shared projects with real-time updates and notifications.
Responsive design: Access project boards from desktop, tablet, or mobile devices with a fully responsive interface.
Task assignment: Assign tasks to team members and track who is responsible for each item.
Progress visualization: View project progress at a glance with visual indicators and completion percentages.
Comments: Discuss tasks with team members using threaded comments for context and collaboration.
Simple setup: Get started quickly with minimal configuration and an intuitive user interface.
Workload overview: See team capacity and task distribution to balance workloads effectively.
Filtering: Filter tasks by assignee, status, priority, or custom criteria to focus on relevant work.
Activity tracking: Monitor recent changes and updates across projects to stay informed of progress.
